text: tavada apagē vadan viśvāsa karana aya num̆ba veta pæmiṇi viṭa num̆balāṭa salām (śāntiya) yæyi num̆ba (ovunaṭa) pavasanu. num̆balāgē paramādhipati taman kerehi karuṇā va niyama kara gattēya. niyata vaśayenma num̆balā aturin kavarek nodænuvatkamin yam napurak koṭa in pasuva pasutævili vī hæḍa gæsuṇēda eviṭa sæbævinma ohu (allāh) ati kṣamāśīlīya. mahā karuṇā guṇayen yuktaya
